titleSection.name: VersionOne Subversion Integration
titleSection.shortDescription: View code changes for a story or defect quickly by integrating VersionOne with your source code manager.

descriptionSection.description: The VersionOne Subversion Integration (V1Svn) creates a record of Subversion changesets in VersionOne, so the development team can quickly view all of the code changes for a story or defect. This visibility can be useful when tracking down defects or performing code reviews.

updates.releaseNotes:
* Updated: Sharp SVN DLL to 1.7. 
 * Added: Logging of connection information on start-up.

* Added: Support for connecting to VersionOne through a proxy. 
 * Added: Configuration Utility contains help on the various configuration options to enable quicker setup and configuration. 
 * Added: Configuration Utility supports a minimum poll interval of one minute for testing. It is not recommended that poll intervals remain this low in a production instance. 
 * Update: Source code project was dependent on .NET 3.5. Now source code project depends on the latest .NET SDK. 
 * Updated: Integration depends on Log4Net 
 * Updated: Poll time interval defaults to 30 minutes 
 * Fixed: Configuration Utility allows editing of the VersionOne credential fields when Windows Integrated Authentication is enabled. This enables configuring the integrations to connect to VersionOne as a user other than the local service account when the VersionOne instance is configured for Windows integrated authentication.

* Added GUI Tool for configuration 
 * Updated Documentation

* Added support for accessing Subversion Server using https 
 * Added support for Subversion Server 1.6.2 
 * Removed dependency on the older APIClient library.  Integration now depends on APIClient library from SDK

qualityBands.name: seed
qualityBands.shortDesc: The initial idea of a product. No working code.

qualityBands.name: sapling
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is undergoing rapid growth. The code works but expect major changes.

qualityBands.name: mature
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.

mediaSection.title: Subversion Integration
mediaSection.caption: View code changes for a story or defect quickly by integrating VersionOne with your source code manager.
